findings.title: #1. Whitespaces
findings.description: The last argument must not be succeeded by any whitespace or comment. Remove the last whitespace

findings.title: #2 Trailing whitespace
findings.description: Line contains trailing whitespace. Remove whitespace

findings.title: #3. Whitespace only on both sides
findings.description: Assignment operator must have single space on both sides of it

findings.title: #4. Require statement needs error message
findings.description: Provide an error message for the require statement

findings.title: #5 Trailing whitespace
findings.description: Line contains trailing whitespace. Remove whitespace

findings.title: #6. Whitespaces
findings.description: The last argument must not be succeeded by any whitespace or comment. Remove the last whitespace
